name: Project Setup & Core Layout
description: Initialize repository, set up Next.js and Tailwind CSS, and create the shared header and footer layout.
category: Half-Day 0.5: Repo + Tailwind setup + layout skeleton

subtasks.name: Initialize Next.js Repository
subtasks.description: Run `pnpm create next-app@15` to set up the project.

subtasks.name: Configure Tailwind CSS
subtasks.description: Add Tailwind CSS, PostCSS, and Autoprefixer to the project.

subtasks.name: Create Shared Header and Footer
subtasks.description: Implement the common header and footer components for all pages.

name: Home Page Development
description: Complete the main landing page with all specified elements.

subtasks.name: Implement Hero Section
subtasks.description: Develop the hero section with a 12-word headline, sub-line, and a giant 'CALL NOW' tel: button.

subtasks.name: Add Service Icons
subtasks.description: Integrate four service icons on the home page.

subtasks.name: Include Testimonial
subtasks.description: Add one customer testimonial to the home page.

subtasks.name: Display Trust-Badge Strip
subtasks.description: Implement a strip of trust badges.

name: Services & About Pages Development
description: Develop the dedicated services and about pages.

subtasks.name: Develop Services Page
subtasks.description: Create the /services page with a grid or list of all services, 2-sentence blurbs, and icons.

subtasks.name: Develop About Page
subtasks.description: Create the /about page with a 100-word story and a photo.

name: Contact Page & Form Integration
description: Build the contact page and integrate the lead capture form with Formspree.

subtasks.name: Develop Contact Form
subtasks.description: Create the contact form with fields for name, email, phone, and message.

subtasks.name: Integrate Formspree Endpoint
subtasks.description: Configure the contact form to submit data to a Formspree endpoint.

subtasks.name: Add Tap-to-Call & Tap-to-Text Buttons
subtasks.description: Include buttons for direct phone calls and text messages.

subtasks.name: Include Static Map Screenshot
subtasks.description: Add a static screenshot of a map to the contact page.

name: Quality Assurance & Deployment
description: Perform final manual QA and deploy the application to Vercel.
category: Half-Day 0.25: Manual eyeball QA, push to Vercel

subtasks.name: Perform Manual Eyeball QA
subtasks.description: Visually inspect the site for any layout or functional issues, especially on iPhone 13 screen.

subtasks.name: Deploy to Vercel
subtasks.description: Push the completed project to Vercel for live deployment.

subtasks.name: Verify Hero Button Functionality
subtasks.description: Ensure the big hero button correctly initiates a phone call.

subtasks.name: Verify Form Submission
subtasks.description: Confirm that the contact form submits successfully and displays 'Thanks—we’ll call you.'
